title: Tomato and Cabbage Soup
ingredients: ['5 carrots, chopped', '3 onions, chopped', '2 (400g) tins whole plum peeled tomatoes, with liquid', '1 large head cabbage, chopped', '1 (27g) packet onion cup soup mix', '1 (400g) tin cut green beans, drained', '2 litres tomato juice', '2 green peppers, diced', '10 sticks celery, chopped', '400ml beef stock']
